title: CLI MCP Mapper Commands Schema
description: Schema for defining CLI commands to be exposed as MCP tools

commands.description: Map of command names to command definitions

description.description: Human-readable description of what the command does

baseArgs.description: Static arguments that are always passed to the command

parameters.description: Map of parameter names to parameter definitions

type.description: The data type of the parameter

position.description: Position for positional arguments (0-based). If set, the parameter is passed by position rather than by name

argName.description: The argument name/flag to use (e.g., '--output', '-v'). Not used for positional parameters

argValue.description: Static value to pass after argName for boolean flags (rarely used)

enum.description: List of allowed values for the parameter

default.description: Default value for the parameter if not provided
